籤詩版本二:
Madzi ozizira ndi msuzi wowira wosatenthedwa, osati wozizira kapena wotentha koma wofunda
Kusachita china chilichonse padziko lapansi, kukhala wamphamvu mumitundu yonse yaukadaulo
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ndi chizindikiro cha kugwiritsa ntchito bwino zinthu.
Chilichonse nchokhazikika komanso chabwino.
解曰: Akaidi amakhululukidwa. Matenda amakumana ndi dokotala wabwino. funa chuma ndi chiyembekezo. Malangizo abwino.
籤詩故事一:
◇Lintong Rescue
Late Sui Dynasty. Mfumu Li Yuan ya Mzera wa Tang anadutsa pafupi ndi phiri lobzala mitengo m'munsi mwa Phiri la Lintong.Mwadzidzidzi, amuna amphamvu osaŵerengeka anatuluka m'nkhalangomo, akutsekereza njira ndi mikondo yaitali ndi nkhwangwa, n'cholinga chofuna kuwapha. Li Yuan anali atazunguliridwa ndipo zinali zovuta kwambiri.
Pa nthawiyi, Shubao anali atatsala pang'ono kugona m'kachisi wa Wuyuan, anadabwa atamva phokoso la amuna ndi akavalo akufuula kuti aphedwe kunja kwa kachisi. Nthawi yomweyo anakwera hatchi yake n’kuthamangira pakati pa phirilo, ndipo utsi ndi fumbi zinali paliponse m’munsi mwa phirilo ndipo kunkamveka mfuu yakupha.
Ndi liwiro la mphezi, Shu Bao anathamangira mkati ndikupha anthu ambirimbiri motsatizana.
Anapulumutsa banja la Li Yuan. Ndiye kuti, adagwiritsidwanso ntchito ndi mfumu ya Tang Dynasty. Iye anakhala ngwazi woyambitsa wa Tang Dynasty.
聖意: Banja limadzichitira zabwino, kufunafuna chuma, ndipo kuchitapo kanthu ndi ukwati. Amuna oyenda pansi ku Liujia amafika kumunda, mphutsi za silika zakhwima, ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi zikuyenda bwino, kufunafuna anthu, milandu inabalalika, kusamuka n’kwabwino, katundu wotayika wapezeka, matenda ndi otetezeka, phiri ndi manda n’zabwino.
第X籤: Chizindikiro makumi asanu ndi awiri mphambu zisanu ndi zitatu
